sentences.en: A cyclone in the tropics is caused by a smaller area of low pressure.
sentences.cn: 热带暴风是由小面积低压引起的.

sentences.en: A region of low pressure with roughly concentric isobars is known technically as a cyclone.
sentences.cn: 具有大致同心的等压线的低压区在技术上称为气旋.

sentences.en: A tropical cyclone brought heavy rain to the country last week.
sentences.cn: 上周一股热带气旋使该国受到暴雨袭击.

sentences.en: An exceptionally violent cyclone hit the town last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚异常猛烈的旋风吹袭了那个小镇.

sentences.en: But, few children from the cyclone struck Irrawaddy Delta will be going.
sentences.cn: 但是在伊洛瓦底江三角洲强热带风暴灾区,很少有儿童会去上学.

sentences.en: By using cyclone separators to return the entrained solids, even higher gas velocities can be used.
sentences.cn: 当采用丁旋风分离器来使夹带固体颗粒返回时, 还可用更高的气速.

sentences.en: Colorimeter , React - R - Mill, Reagent dye Dispenser , Electronic Balance Cyclone Sample Mill.
sentences.cn: 色度计、反应碾磨机 、 染色试剂、电子天平 、 样品碾磨机.

sentences.en: In 1974 Darwin was devastated by Cyclone Tracy.
sentences.cn: 1974年达尔文被热带气旋特蕾西夷为平地.

sentences.en: It's been a bad season with disease and that terrible cyclone.
sentences.cn: 因为病虫害和龙卷风,菠萝的收成不是很好.

sentences.en: Strong winds blow around the center of a tropical cyclone.
sentences.cn: 热带气旋中心周围刮着强风.

sentences.en: Studies on the Service Life of 200 mm Cyclone Cones.
sentences.cn: 200mm旋流器锥筒使用寿命的试验研究.

sentences.en: The cyclone brought misery to thousands of people.
sentences.cn: 旋风给成千上万的人带来苦难.

sentences.en: The dedusting mechanism of the Axial cyclone and refractory properties are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了旋风除尘器的除尘机理和选用的耐火材料的性能.

sentences.en: The race was called off as a cyclone struck.
sentences.cn: 由于旋风袭击，比赛被取消了。

sentences.en: This control requires knowledge of attrition kinetics and cyclone effectiveness.
sentences.cn: 这种控制要求颗粒磨损动力学和旋风分离器效率的知识.

sentences.en: Weather fronts are bound up with a frontal cyclone.
sentences.cn: 天气的锋面和锋面气旋密切相关.

trans.tran_cn: 气旋，旋风，飓风，暴风，旋风分离器
trans.tran_en: a very strong wind that moves very fast in a circle
